1198430.name: Delusion
1198430.description:
SE Productions presents Delusion

What separates life from death? What separates a delusion from reality? These questions shall be answered as you delve into the story of this family. You will be the father and want to find out what actually happened to your wife and son. Your wife claimed by many to have been murdered, with no proof and body being found, you decide to do the searching on your own. You will discover things never known before. Set within your own house, you shall dive deeper into unknown truths and begin to uncover mysteries that were once buried behind lies.

THOSE WHO HUNT IN THE SHADOWS

Something lurks in the corners of your house, watching your every move. Why is it following you? What are its intentions? How many are there? YOU shall find out. Fighting may not be a wise option against an unknown enemy so run, hide and evade them. With many tools equipped by your side as you journey through this story, be prepared to walk in the path ahead. There is no going back.

REALITY

Don't play as the father, BE the father. Explore this story and see it from the eyes of one family member who has been through a lot and is going to go through a lot more. No matter what, the truth pulls you deeper. What happened to your son and wife? As you roam through the house you will find many notes left behind by your son, papers detailing interesting things, finding these will be essential to understanding what is truly going on. Your son discovered something beyond this world, whatever it is understanding it might change the course of this reality. This reality is our delusion.



Walk through darkness to uncover the light hidden within. Fight through your fears and answer your questions as you go through territories you never thought existed. Question everything and leave nothing unanswered in this path. Everything you think you know may not be as it is. Contain your delusion before it gets out of hand.
